item.title: Using emojis in this setup
item.author: your@email.com (Your Name)
item.description: I set the following flag in the config file: enableEmoji = true This should mean that emojis work, so the following code: :smile: :metal: :skull: Should provide these: :smile: :metal: :skull: Here is a cheatsheet of emoji codes: https://www.webpagefx.com/tools/emoji-cheat-sheet/
